title: Europe Today
additional-notes: This is a French publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

Some issues of this serial have distinctive titles.  Before concluding that such an issue is in the public domain, search for book renewals under its distinctive title. We have not systematically searched individual issue titles.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Shelton Henderson for copyright research on this title.
